creator: Laurence Edmondson
title: Hamilton: Ferrari set up to win, no plans to retire
dc:creator: Laurence Edmondson
content: Lewis Hamilton believes Ferrari has "every ingredient" to win a world championship and confirmed he has no plans to quit Formula 1 if he secures a record eighth title this year.
contentSnippet: Lewis Hamilton believes Ferrari has "every ingredient" to win a world championship and confirmed he has no plans to quit Formula 1 if he secures a record eighth title this year.

creator: Reuters
title: Antonelli to heed Hamilton's advice as debut nears
dc:creator: Reuters
content: Rookie driver Andrea Kimi Anonelli has said he plans to follow the advice of Lewis Hamilton, who he is replacing at Mercedes this season, by shutting out the "hype."
contentSnippet: Rookie driver Andrea Kimi Anonelli has said he plans to follow the advice of Lewis Hamilton, who he is replacing at Mercedes this season, by shutting out the "hype."

creator: Laurence Edmondson
title: Vasseur encourages Hamilton, Leclerc competition
dc:creator: Laurence Edmondson
content: Ferrari team principal Fred Vasseur is happy for Lewis Hamilton and Charles Leclerc to engage in a healthy rivalry this year and remains confident it will not descend into internal politics.
contentSnippet: Ferrari team principal Fred Vasseur is happy for Lewis Hamilton and Charles Leclerc to engage in a healthy rivalry this year and remains confident it will not descend into internal politics.

creator: ESPN
title: Ferrari's new car: Hamilton, Leclerc debut on track

content: Ferrari took to the track for the first time on Wednesday with the new 2025 car it hopes will end a lengthy Formula 1 trophy drought.

creator: Laurence Edmondson
title: Verstappen denies talk of $1bn Aston Martin offer
dc:creator: Laurence Edmondson
content: Reigning champion Max Verstappen says he has not held talks with Aston Martin about a blockbuster move from Red Bull, saying the first he heard of the story was through the media.

creator: ESPN
title: Bearman explains long-ago failed driving test

title: Hamilton 'invigorated' by Ferrari at F1 75 debut

creator: ESPN
title: F1 set for 'Monaco-specific' rule to aid overtaking
dc:creator: ESPN
content: Formula 1 is set to implement "Monaco-specific regulations" in a bid to aid overtaking at the sport's most famous race, the governing FIA announced on Tuesday.

creator: Reuters
title: Russell: No talks with Max... but I won't change
dc:creator: Reuters
content: George Russell has not spoken to Formula 1 champion Max Verstappen since their end-of-season bust-up in Abu Dhabi last December.
